languages.text: {n}Задержавшись на мгновение, Ульфар подмигивает Комиссару.{/n} "Бесстрашный ты ублюдок. Так и быть, ты получишь свою строчку в моей саге. Прощай и бейся доблестно, чтобы Всеотец слышал крики твоих врагов".

{n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."
languages.original_text: {n}Задержавшись на мгновение, Ульфар подмигивает Комиссару.{/n} "Бесстрашный ты ублюдок. Так и быть, ты получишь свою строчку в моей саге. Прощай и бейся доблестно, чтобы Всеотец слышал крики твоих врагов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}しばらくその場に留まってから、ウルファーはコミッサーにウィンクを送る。{/n}「お前は怖い物知らずの悪党だな。いいだろう、俺のサーガの一行にふさわしい。別れを告げ、勇猛に戦え。全知の父にお前の敵の叫びを聞いていただけるように」
languages.original_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくその場に留まってから、ウルファーはコミッサーにウィンクを送る。{/n}「お前は怖い物知らずの悪党だな。いいだろう、俺のサーガの一行にふさわしい。別れを告げ、勇猛に戦え。全知の父にお前の敵の叫びを聞いていただけるように」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法停顿半晌，朝政委眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“你是个无赖，但也是个胆大包天的无赖。很好，我会在史诗里给你留一行。再见了，勇敢地去战斗吧，让全父听到敌人的哀号。”
languages.original_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法停顿半晌，朝政委眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“你是个无赖，但也是个胆大包天的无赖。很好，我会在史诗里给你留一行。再见了，勇敢地去战斗吧，让全父听到敌人的哀号。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, Ulfar finit par lancer un clin d'œil au commissaire.{/n} « Vous êtes une canaille des plus téméraires. Très bien, ma saga vous consacrera un vers. Adieu et battez-vous si vaillamment que le Père de Tous puisse entendre les hurlements de vos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, Ulfar finit par lancer un clin d'œil au commissaire.{/n} « Vous êtes une canaille des plus téméraires. Très bien, ma saga vous consacrera un vers. Adieu et battez-vous si vaillamment que le Père de Tous puisse entendre les hurlements de vos ennemis. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras hacer una pausa, Ulfar guiña un ojo al Comisario.{/n} «Mira que es usted canalla. Muy bien, quédese con un verso en mi saga. Despídase y luche con valentía; así el Padre de todas las cosas oirá los gritos de sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras hacer una pausa, Ulfar guiña un ojo al Comisario.{/n} «Mira que es usted canalla. Muy bien, quédese con un verso en mi saga. Despídase y luche con valentía; así el Padre de todas las cosas oirá los gritos de sus enemigos».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar zögert einen Augenblick und zwinkert dem Kommissar schließlich zu.{/n} "Ihr seid ein furchtloser Mistkerl. Also schön, Ihr bekommt eine Zeile in meiner Saga. Lebt wohl und kämpft tapfer, auf dass der Allvater die Schreie Eurer Feinde hören möge."
languages.original_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar zögert einen Augenblick und zwinkert dem Kommissar schließlich zu.{/n} "Ihr seid ein furchtloser Mistkerl. Also schön, Ihr bekommt eine Zeile in meiner Saga. Lebt wohl und kämpft tapfer, auf dass der Allvater die Schreie Eurer Feinde hören möge."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saniye duraksayan Ulfar, Komiser'e göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Alçak da olsan gözü pek bir alçaksın. Öyle olsun, efsanemde sana da yer vereceğim. Yiğitçe savaş; savaş ki Yücebaba'nın kulakları, düşmanlarının çığlıklarıyla çınlasın. Elveda!"
languages.original_text: {n}Lingering for a moment, Ulfar winks at the Commissar.{/n} "You are a fearless scoundrel. All right, you can have a line in my saga. Farewell and fight valiantly, so that the Allfather may hear the screams of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç saniye duraksayan Ulfar, Komiser'e göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Alçak da olsan gözü pek bir alçaksın. Öyle olsun, efsanemde sana da yer vereceğim. Yiğitçe savaş; savaş ki Yücebaba'nın kulakları, düşmanlarının çığlıklarıyla çınlasın. Elveda!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
